title: Wicked Heat: Part 1
description: Killing demons is hard. Falling for four sexy men is even harder.There’s nothing safe about my life. Not when I’m a demon hunter, and my ability to attract Hellish creatures makes it close to impossible to have any semblance of a normal life. Color me surprised when I find myself with not one, but four men in my life.But of course it’s complicated.First there’s Ryder, my piece of shit ex-boyfriend whose bad boy ways make me have dirty thoughts, and then there’s the damn cop who’s been riding my case for the last two months. With that ripped body of his, it’s me who should be doing the riding. At least I still have Asher, with his humor and gentle touch, and finally Knox, my sexy best friend who has no idea he’s breaking my heart.But when these men become allies in my war against a demonic beast running rampage in town, I’m terrified of what I’m about to lose.Wicked Heat is a four-book, slow burn, dark reverse harem series that sets itself apart from other paranormal romance novels while still capturing all the elements of the genre readers love! Demons, shifters, witches and warlocks fill these magical pages with a strong and feisty female lead and her four sexy-as-sin men. Don’t miss this chance to read a series that will stick with you long after you're finished! Scroll up and grab your copy today!
author: Mila Young
